comment: Two ways to say a mapping from metric ` C ` to metric ` D ` is continuous at point ` P ` . Theorem 14-4.3 of [Gleason] p. 240. (Contributed by NM, 17-May-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2014.)
